text: Simplicity is the second studio album by British indie rock band Jaws. The album was self-released on 4 November 2016. == Track listing == == Critical reception == Simplicity received positive reviews from contemporary music critics. On review aggregator site, Album of the Year, the album received an average critic score of 80 out of 100. == Personnel == * Connor Schofield – vocals, rhythm guitar * Alex Hudson – lead guitar * Eddy Geach – drums == References == == External links == * * Category:2016 albums Category:Jaws (band) albums
title: Simplicity (Jaws album)
